meanings.definition: Mashgichim - plural form of mashgiach, a supervisor or overseer
meanings.sent1: The mashgichim at the factory make sure everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The school principal is like a mashgichim, overseeing the students and teachers.
meanings.sent3: The mashgichim decided to have a race to see who could supervise the fastest!
meanings.sent4: As the mashgichim of the project, they kept a watchful eye on every detail.
meanings.sent5: The mashgichim's presence was felt throughout the building, ensuring order and efficiency.

meanings.definition: Mashgichim - those who ensure that food is prepared according to kosher dietary laws
meanings.sent1: The mashgichim in the kitchen checked every ingredient for kosher compliance.
meanings.sent2: At the restaurant, the mashgichim made sure all meals met the dietary requirements.
meanings.sent3: The mashgichim threw a party celebrating their successful kosher food inspections.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling kitchen, the mashgichim were like food guardians, protecting tradition.
meanings.sent5: The diligent mashgichim meticulously verified each step of the food preparation process.
